flawed_nl_solution:
Each employee needs $35000-$20000=$<<35000-20000=14970>>14970 more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay $14970*10=$<<14970*10=149700>>149700 extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of $1000000-$149700=$<<1000000-149700=850300>>850300 per year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15000, not 14970. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
